author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-4666. Define ".snapshot" as a reserved inode name so that users cannot create a file/directory with ".snapshot" as the name.  If ".snapshot" is used in a previous version of HDFS, it must be renamed before upgrade; otherwise, upgrade will fail.

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-4328 : Change default bigtable selection policy for sort-merge joins (Namit Jain via Ashutosh Chauhan)
